column2: 5. Drinking alcohol while taking drugs:
column4: reduces the effects of the alcohol.

column2: 6. On what three conditions does your blood alcohol content (BAC) depend?
column4: How fit you are. How much alcohol you drink. Your height.
column6: Your height. How much alcohol you drink. The type of beverage you drink.

column10: Your weight. How much alcohol you drink. How much time passes between drinks.

column2: 7. You may not pass another vehicle on either side of a _______ centerline.

column2: 9. What is the meaning of orange traffic signs?
